languages.text: "Невозможно выковать клинок, не используя молота и закалки, как невозможно быть Лорд-капитаном и не проливать крови врагов и подданных своих. У каждого свой молот и своя наковальня".
"A blade cannot be forged without hammer and fire, and a Domin cannot reign without spilling the blood of enemies and subjects alike. We all have our own hammer and anvil."
languages.original_text: "Невозможно выковать клинок, не используя молота и закалки, как невозможно быть Лорд-капитаном и не проливать крови врагов и подданных своих. У каждого свой молот и своя наковальня".

traits.locale_text: "No blade can be forged without hammer and fire, as no Enim can reign without spilling the blood of their enemies and subjects. Each of us has our own hammer and anvil."
"No blade can be forged without hammer and fire, as no Enim can reign without spilling the blood of their enemies and subjects. Each of us has our own hammer and anvil."
"A blade cannot be forged without hammer and fire, and an Enim cannot reign without spilling the blood of enemies and subjects alike. We all have our own hammer and anvil."
"A blade cannot be forged without hammer and fire, and an Enim cannot reign without spilling the blood of enemies and subjects alike. We all have our own hammer and anvil."
"A blade cannot be forged without hammer and fire, and a Domin cannot reign without spilling the blood of enemies and subjects alike. We all have our own hammer and anvil."
"A blade cannot be forged without hammer and fire, and a Domin cannot reign without spilling the blood of enemies and subjects alike. We all have our own hammer and anvil."

languages.text: «No puede forjarse una hoja sin el fuego y el martillo, así como un Domin tampoco puede reinar sin derramar la sangre de enemigos y súbditos por igual. Todos tenemos nuestros propios yunque y martillo».
languages.original_text: "A blade cannot be forged without hammer and fire, and a Domin cannot reign without spilling the blood of enemies and subjects alike. We all have our own hammer and anvil."

traits.locale_text: «No puede forjarse una hoja sin el fuego y el martillo, así como un Domin tampoco puede reinar sin derramar la sangre de enemigos y súbditos por igual. Todos tenemos nuestros propios yunque y martillo».

languages.text: 「刃はハンマーと炎なくして鍛えられず、ドミンは敵や進化の血を流さずして君臨することはできない。私たちは、誰もが自分のハンマーと金床を持っているの」
languages.original_text: "A blade cannot be forged without hammer and fire, and a Domin cannot reign without spilling the blood of enemies and subjects alike. We all have our own hammer and anvil."

traits.locale_text: 「刃はハンマーと炎なくして鍛えられず、ドミンは敵や進化の血を流さずして君臨することはできない。私たちは、誰もが自分のハンマーと金床を持っているの」

languages.text: “若是失去了烈火与锻造，就无法打造出锋利的刀刃。若是秘者不允许自己的臣民与敌人流血，就无法统治王朝。我们每个人都有各自的锤子与铁砧。”
languages.original_text: "A blade cannot be forged without hammer and fire, and a Domin cannot reign without spilling the blood of enemies and subjects alike. We all have our own hammer and anvil."

traits.locale_text: “若是失去了烈火与锻造，就无法打造出锋利的刀刃。若是秘者不允许自己的臣民与敌人流血，就无法统治王朝。我们每个人都有各自的锤子与铁砧。”

languages.text: "Eine Klinge kann nicht ohne Hammer und Feuer geschmiedet werden, und ein Domin kann nicht regieren, ohne das Blut von Feinden und Untertanen gleichermaßen zu vergießen. Wir alle haben unseren eigenen Hammer und Amboss."
languages.original_text: "A blade cannot be forged without hammer and fire, and a Domin cannot reign without spilling the blood of enemies and subjects alike. We all have our own hammer and anvil."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Klinge kann nicht ohne Hammer und Feuer geschmiedet werden, und ein Domin kann nicht regieren, ohne das Blut von Feinden und Untertanen gleichermaßen zu vergießen. Wir alle haben unseren eigenen Hammer und Amboss."

languages.text: « C'est ainsi, on ne forge pas de lame sans un marteau et une forge, et {mf|un|une} Domin ne peut régner sans verser le sang de ses ennemis comme de ses sujets. Nous avons tous notre propre marteau et notre propre enclume. »
languages.original_text: "A blade cannot be forged without hammer and fire, and a Domin cannot reign without spilling the blood of enemies and subjects alike. We all have our own hammer and anvil."

traits.locale_text: « C'est ainsi, on ne forge pas de lame sans un marteau et une forge, et {mf|un|une} Domin ne peut régner sans verser le sang de ses ennemis comme de ses sujets. Nous avons tous notre propre marteau et notre propre enclume. »

languages.original_text: "A blade cannot be forged without hammer and fire, and a Domin cannot reign without spilling the blood of enemies and subjects alike. We all have our own hammer and anvil."

languages.text: "Nasıl ki kılıç dediğin çekiçsiz ve ateşsiz dövülmez, Dominler de hem düşmanlarının hem de kullarının kanını dökmeden hükmedemez. Herkesin çekici ve örsü ayrıdır."
languages.original_text: "A blade cannot be forged without hammer and fire, and a Domin cannot reign without spilling the blood of enemies and subjects alike. We all have our own hammer and anvil."
